name: EnergyApplianceMonitor Sensor
description: 공기질 로깅 ex)Foobot(5분 주기로 데이터를 가져옴)

name.title: Name
name.description: name of the sensor - format: firstName+LastName ex)jonghoLee, wanhoIm

forms.href: there should be url for access value of this property

user.title: User
user.description: user of the sensor - format: firstName+LastName ex)jonghoLee, wanhoIm

forms.href: there should be url for access value of this property

address.title: Address
address.description: building where the sensor resides - format: organization-building ex)yongjaelee-house, kist-l1, kist-l8

forms.href: there should be url for access value of this property

room.title: Room
room.description: room number of the building where the sensor resides - ex) L8321

forms.href: there should be url for access value of this property

location.title: Location
location.description: location of the sensor - format: free

forms.href: there should be url for access value of this property

time.title: Time
time.description: time at which the data measurement was made - ex)"2017-05-30T18:54:20+09:00"

forms.href: there should be url for access value of this property
there should be url for access value of this property

activePower.title: ActivePower
activePower.description: appliance activePower - unit: W, 양수: On, 음수: Off

forms.href: there should be url for access value of this property
